articles.title: Will I get refunds? Small businesses wonder as courts rule on Trump tariffs - NPR
articles.description: Court rulings against President Trump's tariffs could spell relief for many American importers — if the decisions hold. For now, the uncertainty remains.
articles.content:
Many American small-business owners have been riding a rollercoaster of tariff-related feelings: worry, confusion, anxiety, frustration.
This week, there are new emotions.
"I feel a lot of relief a… [+6335 chars]

articles.title: White House acknowledges problems in RFK Jr.'s ‘Make America Healthy Again’ report - AP News
articles.description: The White House will fix errors in a much-anticipated federal government report spearheaded by U.S. Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr., which decried America’s food supply, pesticides and prescription drugs. Kennedy’s wide-ranging “Make…
